generated_body: In the article titled "Air Quality Index: What to do when the air quality is bad in your area," the user can expect to find practical guidance on how to assess and respond to poor air quality conditions. It is likely to include information on interpreting the Air Quality Index (AQI) readings, along with recommendations for protective measures individuals can take, such as staying indoors or using air purifiers. Additionally, the article may discuss the health implications of different pollution levels and provide resources for monitoring air quality in their local area.
